author: Icon
title: Gazing Forward: Louis Vuitton's Vision of Tomorrow
text:
Louis Vuitton’s Fall/Winter 2025 Men’s Collection, unveiled at the iconic Cour Carrée du Louvre, proves Pharrell Williams and NIGO are the dream team we didn’t know we needed. Dubbed “Remember the Future,” the collection fuses old-school workwear with Pharrell’s streetwear edge, creating a wearable ode to their shared history. It’s a masterclass in cross-pollination – think archival grit meets Louis Vuitton’s signature savoir-faire. From bold nods to twentieth-century craftsmanship to a forward-thinking LVERS philosophy that celebrates community and creativity, this line is for men who dress with purpose. Future generations, take notes – this is your blueprint.

author: Williams Perdomo
title: Rescatan a 31 trabajadores tras derrumbe de un túnel en Los Ángeles
text:
Rescatan a 31 trabajadores tras derrumbe de un túnel en Los Ángeles
La operación contó con más de 100 socorristas del LAFD y equipo especializado de toda la ciudad, incluidos los equipos de búsqueda y rescate urbano del LAFD especialmente capacitados para el rescate subterráneo en espacios confinados.
Las autoridades informaron de que al menos 31 trabajadores de la construcción fueron rescatados después de que un túnel industrial se derrumbara en Wilmington, Los Ángeles.
Las autoridades explicaron que, al recibir el reporte de que un número considerable de trabajadores de la construcción había quedado atrapado en la excavación, el Departamento de Bomberos de Los Ángeles elevó la situación a un operativo de rescate mayor, activando un protocolo de emergencia especializado en túneles.
El llamado al Departamento de Bomberos
La operación contó con más de 100 socorristas del LAFD y equipo especializado de toda la ciudad, incluidos los equipos de búsqueda y rescate urbano del LAFD especialmente capacitados para el rescate subterráneo en espacios confinados.
“Con un esfuerzo considerable, todos los trabajadores varados, pero afortunadamente ilesos, lograron ponerse a salvo, uno a uno, a través de la extensa sección de tierra y escombros amontonados antes de la llegada de los rescatistas del LAFD. Sus compañeros los transportaron más de ocho kilómetros en un vehículo de transporte del túnel hasta la seguridad del portal de acceso”, resaltó el Cuerpo de Bomberos.

organizations.name: Departamento de Bomberos de Los Ángeles

author: Karla Orona
title: La flor colorida y bonita que ahuyenta mosquitos, moscas y hormigas | Radio Fórmula
text: Algunas plantas destacan por sus componentes que repelen insectos, como esta flor que suele colocarse en macetas por ser muy decorativa para patios, balcones y como planta de interior. Además de ser colorida y bonita, [ahuyenta a los mosquitos](https://www.radioformula.com.mx/estilo-de-vida/2024/7/8/los-mejores-trucos-para-evitar-que-entren-los-mosquitos-tu-casa-823655.html), las moscas y las hormigas; entre otras plagas. Cuál es la flor que ahuyenta mosquitos, moscas y hormigas Los crisantemos contienen fitoquímicos, llamados piretrinas, que impiden que los insectos se alimenten de ellas. Las propiedades insecticidas de la especie Chrysanthemum pyrethrum fueron descubiertas por los chinos, y en la Edad Media se divulgaron hacia el oeste por la Ruta de la Seda, explican en el Portal Tecno Agrícola. Añaden que en el siglo XIX, estas plantas se utilizaron en Croacia, Estados Unidos, Francia, Japón, y otros países. De acuerdo con la Agencia para Sustancias Tóxicas y el Registro de Enfermedades de Estados Unidos, las piretrinas son compuestos naturales que tienen propiedades de insecticidas y que se encuentran en el extracto de piretro de ciertas flores de crisantemos. Te podría interesar Estas sustancias se usan a menudo en insecticidas para uso doméstico y en productos para controlar insectos. Cuidados del crisantemo El crisantemo es una de las plantas ornamentales más populares, ya que gusta por su gran variedad de colores y formas. La versatilidad es una de sus características la hace adecuada como planta de interior y de jardín, o para arreglos florales. Existen más de 40 especies diferentes de crisantemos (Chrysanthemum), estas pertenecen a la familia de las margaritas (Asteraceae). La planta proviene originalmente del este de Asia, más precisamente de China y Japón. El crisantemo necesita la luz del sol para una floración, pero no debe estar bajo los rayos del sol. El cuidado de estas flores también incluye la elección correcta de la tierra para macetas, y se debe considerar que tienen un alto requerimiento de agua.

author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: Customer's photo of forlorn owner in empty restaurant leads business to boom at OK diner Nick Chappell had never been to Spirals Hot Dogs & More before he took a photo of Scott Festler in his empty restaurant. But after business boomed, Chappell's part of the Spirals family, Festler says. [Anthony Robledo](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/7612431001/anthony-robledo/) An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Festler standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Festler would soon have no time to stand around as " [Spirals: Hot Dogs & More](https://spiralshotdogs.com/)," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Festler told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Festler found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Festler said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Festler wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': [See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her](/story/life/humankind/2023/12/26/dolly-parton-meets-longtime-fan/72033945007/) Customer knew he had to capture 'wholesome moment' Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Festler gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Festler waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Owner adds new 'Thunderbird' item in customer's honor Festler is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalapeños, Festler said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn’t have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Festler added.
